verses.verse: And <S%H3130>Joseph<s%> was brought <S%H3381>down<s%> to <S%H4714>Egypt;<s%> and <S%H6318>Potiphar,<s%> an <S%H5631>officer<s%> of <S%H6547>Pharaoh,<s%> <S%H8269>captain<s%> of the <S%H2876>guard,<s%> an <S%H376>Egyptian,<s%> <S%H4713><s%> <S%H7069>bought<s%> him of the <S%H4480>hands<s%> <S%H3027><s%> of the <S%H3459>Ishmaelites,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> had brought him <S%H3381>down<s%> <S%H8033>thither.<s%>

And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H1961>was<s%> <S%H854>with<s%> <S%H3130>Joseph,<s%> and he <S%H1961>was<s%> a <S%H6743>prosperous<s%> <S%H376>man;<s%> and he <S%H1961>was<s%> in the <S%H1004>house<s%> of his <S%H113>master<s%> the <S%H4713>Egyptian.<s%>

And his <S%H113>master<s%> <S%H7200>saw<s%> <S%H3588>that<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> was <S%H854>with<s%> him, and that the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> made <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> <S%H1931>he<s%> <S%H6213>did<s%> to <S%H6743>prosper<s%> in his <S%H3027>hand.<s%>

And <S%H3130>Joseph<s%> <S%H4672>found<s%> <S%H2580>grace<s%> in his <S%H5869>sight,<s%> and he <S%H8334>served<s%> him: and he made him <S%H6485>overseer<s%> <S%H5921>over<s%> his <S%H1004>house,<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> that he <S%H3426>had<s%> he <S%H5414>put<s%> into his <S%H3027>hand.<s%>

And it came to <S%H1961>pass<s%> from the <S%H4480>time<s%> <S%H227><s%> that he had made him <S%H6485>overseer<s%> <S%H853><s%> in his <S%H1004>house,<s%> and <S%H5921>over<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> he <S%H3426>had,<s%> that the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H1288>blessed<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H4713>Egyptian's<s%> <S%H1004>house<s%> for Joseph's <S%H1558>sake;<s%> <S%H3130><s%> and the <S%H1293>blessing<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H1961>was<s%> upon <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> he <S%H3426>had<s%> in the <S%H1004>house,<s%> and in the <S%H7704>field.<s%>

And he <S%H5800>left<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> he had in <S%H3130>Joseph's<s%> <S%H3027>hand;<s%> and he <S%H3045>knew<s%> <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H3972>aught<s%> he <S%H854>had,<s%> <S%H3588>save<s%> <S%H518><s%> the <S%H3899>bread<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> <S%H1931>he<s%> did <S%H398>eat.<s%> And <S%H3130>Joseph<s%> <S%H1961>was<s%> a <S%H3303>goodly<s%> <S%H8389><s%> person, and <S%H3303>well<s%> <S%H4758>favored.<s%>

And it came to <S%H1961>pass<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> <S%H428>these<s%> <S%H1697>things,<s%> that his <S%H113>master's<s%> <S%H802>wife<s%> <S%H5375>cast<s%> <S%H853><s%> her <S%H5869>eyes<s%> <S%H413>upon<s%> <S%H3130>Joseph;<s%> and she <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H7901>Lie<s%> <S%H5973>with<s%> me.

But he <S%H3985>refused,<s%> and <S%H559>said<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> his <S%H113>master's<s%> <S%H802>wife,<s%> <S%H2005>Behold,<s%> my <S%H113>master<s%> <S%H3045>knoweth<s%> <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H4100>what<s%> is <S%H854>with<s%> me in the <S%H1004>house,<s%> and he hath <S%H5414>committed<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> he <S%H3426>hath<s%> to my <S%H3027>hand;<s%>

There is <S%H369>none<s%> <S%H1419>greater<s%> in <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H1004>house<s%> <S%H4480>than<s%> I; <S%H3808>neither<s%> hath he kept <S%H2820>back<s%> any <S%H3972>thing<s%> <S%H4480>from<s%> me <S%H3588>but<s%> <S%H518><s%> thee, <S%H834>because<s%> <S%H859>thou<s%> art his <S%H802>wife:<s%> <S%H349>how<s%> then can I <S%H6213>do<s%> <S%H2063>this<s%> <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H7451>wickedness,<s%> and <S%H2398>sin<s%> against <S%H430>God?<s%>

And it came to <S%H1961>pass,<s%> as she <S%H1696>spoke<s%> <S%H413>to<s%> <S%H3130>Joseph<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> by <S%H3117>day,<s%> that he <S%H8085>hearkened<s%> <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> her, to <S%H7901>lie<s%> <S%H681>by<s%> her, or to <S%H1961>be<s%> <S%H5973>with<s%> her.

And it came to <S%H1961>pass<s%> about <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H3117>time,<s%> that Joseph <S%H935>went<s%> into the <S%H1004>house<s%> to <S%H6213>do<s%> his <S%H4399>business;<s%> and there was <S%H369>none<s%> <S%H376><s%> of the <S%H4480>men<s%> <S%H376><s%> of the <S%H1004>house<s%> <S%H8033>there<s%> <S%H1004>within.<s%>

And she <S%H8610>caught<s%> him by his <S%H899>garment,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H7901>Lie<s%> <S%H5973>with<s%> me: and he <S%H5800>left<s%> his <S%H899>garment<s%> in her <S%H3027>hand,<s%> and <S%H5127>fled,<s%> and <S%H3318>got<s%> him <S%H2351>out.<s%>
And it came to <S%H1961>pass,<s%> when she <S%H7200>saw<s%> <S%H3588>that<s%> he had <S%H5800>left<s%> his <S%H899>garment<s%> in her <S%H3027>hand,<s%> and was <S%H5127>fled<s%> <S%H2351>forth,<s%>

That she <S%H7121>called<s%> unto the <S%H376>men<s%> of her <S%H1004>house,<s%> and <S%H559>spoke<s%> unto them, <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H7200>See,<s%> he hath brought <S%H935>in<s%> a <S%H376>Hebrew<s%> <S%H5680><s%> unto us to <S%H6711>mock<s%> us; he came <S%H935>in<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> me to <S%H7901>lie<s%> <S%H5973>with<s%> me, and I <S%H7121>cried<s%> with a <S%H1419>loud<s%> voice: <S%H6963><s%>

And it came to <S%H1961>pass,<s%> when he <S%H8085>heard<s%> <S%H3588>that<s%> I lifted <S%H7311>up<s%> my <S%H6963>voice<s%> and <S%H7121>cried,<s%> that he <S%H5800>left<s%> his <S%H899>garment<s%> <S%H681>with<s%> me, and <S%H5127>fled,<s%> and <S%H3318>got<s%> him <S%H2351>out.<s%>
And she laid <S%H5117>up<s%> his <S%H899>garment<s%> <S%H681>by<s%> her, <S%H5704>until<s%> his <S%H113>lord<s%> <S%H935>came<s%> <S%H413><s%> <S%H1004>home.<s%>

And she <S%H1696>spoke<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> him according to <S%H428>these<s%> <S%H1697>words,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> The <S%H5680>Hebrew<s%> <S%H5650>servant,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> thou hast <S%H935>brought<s%> unto us, came <S%H935>in<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> me to <S%H6711>mock<s%> me:

And it came to <S%H1961>pass,<s%> as I lifted <S%H7311>up<s%> my <S%H6963>voice<s%> and <S%H7121>cried,<s%> that he <S%H5800>left<s%> his <S%H899>garment<s%> <S%H681>with<s%> me, and <S%H5127>fled<s%> <S%H2351>out.<s%>

And it came to <S%H1961>pass,<s%> when his <S%H113>master<s%> <S%H8085>heard<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H1697>words<s%> of his <S%H802>wife,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> she <S%H1696>spoke<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> him, <S%H559>saying,<s%> After <S%H428>this<s%> <S%H1697>manner<s%> <S%H6213>did<s%> thy <S%H5650>servant<s%> to me; that his <S%H639>wrath<s%> was <S%H2734>kindled.<s%>

And <S%H3130>Joseph's<s%> <S%H113>master<s%> <S%H3947>took<s%> him, and <S%H5414>put<s%> him <S%H413>into<s%> the <S%H1004>prison,<s%> <S%H5470><s%> a <S%H4725>place<s%> <S%H834>where<s%> the <S%H4428>king's<s%> <S%H615>prisoners<s%> were <S%H631>bound:<s%> and he <S%H1961>was<s%> <S%H8033>there<s%> in the <S%H1004>prison.<s%> <S%H5470><s%>

But the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H1961>was<s%> <S%H854>with<s%> <S%H3130>Joseph,<s%> and <S%H5186>showed<s%> <S%H413><s%> him <S%H2617>mercy,<s%> and <S%H5414>gave<s%> him <S%H2580>favor<s%> in the <S%H5869>sight<s%> of the <S%H8269>keeper<s%> of the <S%H1004>prison.<s%> <S%H5470><s%>

And the <S%H8269>keeper<s%> of the <S%H1004>prison<s%> <S%H5470><s%> <S%H5414>committed<s%> to <S%H3130>Joseph's<s%> <S%H3027>hand<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H615>prisoners<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> were in the <S%H1004>prison;<s%> <S%H5470><s%> and <S%H3605>whatsoever<s%> <S%H834><s%> they <S%H6213>did<s%> <S%H8033>there,<s%> <S%H1931>he<s%> <S%H1961>was<s%> the <S%H6213>doer<s%> of it.

The <S%H8269>keeper<s%> of the <S%H1004>prison<s%> <S%H5470><s%> <S%H7200>looked<s%> <S%H369>not<s%> <S%H853>to<s%> any <S%H3605>thing<s%> <S%H3972><s%> that was under his <S%H3027>hand;<s%> <S%H834>because<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> was <S%H854>with<s%> him, and that <S%H834>which<s%> <S%H1931>he<s%> <S%H6213>did,<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> made it to <S%H6743>prosper.<s%>
